helpless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: unable to look after yourself or to do anything to help yourself
helpless.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He began to feel depressed and helpless.
a vicious attack on a helpless victim
Newman threw out a hand in a helpless gesture.
helpless.translation[0].definitions[1].d: unable to control a strong feeling that you have
helpless.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We both collapsed into helpless giggles.
He was near to death, and I was helpless with fear.
